00017 /*
00018  * The main entry point for the network manager server
00019  * The server allows for automatic and remote configuration of a computer's network connections
00020  */
00021 
00022 
00023 pthread_t g_main_loop_thread;
00024 //spawned in new thread to run the glib main loop, this loop handles dispatching events
00025 static void* run_main_loop(void* loop)
00026 {
00027   ROS_INFO("GMainLoop Started");
00028   g_main_loop_run ((GMainLoop*)loop);
00029   ROS_INFO("GMainLoop Ended");
00030   pthread_exit(NULL);
00031 }
00032 
00033 //spawns the glib main loop in a new thread
00034 static void spawn_g_main_loop(GMainLoop* loop)
00035 {
00036   int rc = pthread_create(&g_main_loop_thread, NULL, run_main_loop, loop);
00037   if (rc)
00038   {
00039     ROS_ERROR("ERROR; return code from pthread_create() is %d\n", rc);
00040   }
00041 }

00044   ROS_INFO("THIS IS A TEST");
00045 }
00046 
00047 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00048 {
00049   ros::init(argc, argv, "oryx_network_manager_server");
00050   ros::NodeHandle n;
00051   ros::NodeHandle private_n("~");
00052 
00053   ROS_INFO("Starting Oryx Network Manager");
00054   g_type_init();
00055 
00056   ROS_INFO("Initializing glib main loop");
00057   GMainLoop* loop = g_main_loop_new(NULL, FALSE);
00058 
00059   ROS_INFO("Initializing libnm");
00060   dbus_threads_init_default();
00061   DBusGConnection* bus = dbus_g_bus_get(DBUS_BUS_SYSTEM, NULL);
00062   NMClient* client = nm_client_new();
00063   NMRemoteSettings* remote_settings = nm_remote_settings_new(bus);
00064 
00065   if(!remote_settings)
00066     ROS_WARN("Could not get system settings");
00067 
00068 
00069   /* Find out whether setting service is running */
00070   gboolean settings_running;
00071   g_object_get (remote_settings, NM_REMOTE_SETTINGS_SERVICE_RUNNING, &settings_running, NULL);
00072   if (!settings_running) {
00073     ROS_WARN("Can't obtain connections: settings service is not running.");
00074   }
00075   
00076   NetworkDeviceManager deviceManager(n, client);
00077   NetworkConnectionManager connectionManager(n, remote_settings);
00078   ActiveNetworkConnectionManager activeConnectionManager(n, client);
00079   ActivateConnectionService activateConnectionService(n, client, remote_settings);
00080   NetworkConfigurationManager configurationManager(n, client, remote_settings);
00081 
00082   ROS_INFO("Running glib main loop");
00083   spawn_g_main_loop(loop); //spawns main loop in another thread
00084 
00085 
00086   ROS_INFO("Waiting 2 seconds to retrieve connection info");
00087   ros::Time time = ros::Time::now() + ros::Duration(2);
00088   while(ros::ok() && time>ros::Time::now()){
00089     ros::spinOnce();
00090   }
00091 
00092   std::string config_file_name;
00093   if(private_n.getParam("config_file", config_file_name)){
00094     configurationManager.load_config_from_file(config_file_name.c_str());
00095   }
00096   else
00097     ROS_INFO("No config file specified");
00098 
00099   ros::spin();
00100 
00101   printf("Quitting\n");
00102 
00103 //clean up glib main loop
00104   g_main_loop_quit(loop);
00105   g_main_loop_unref(loop);
00106 
00107   printf("Main Loop Stopped\n");
00108 
00109 //cleanup libm
00110   g_object_unref(client);
00111   dbus_g_connection_unref(bus);
00112 
00113 
00114   printf("Waiting on other threads to exit\n");
00115   //wait for main loop thread to terminate
00116   pthread_exit(NULL);
00117 
00118   return 0;
00119 }
